result.title: Facebook Group
result.content:
For  Grey,  Green,  Blue  and   Violet  coders.

Taking inspiration from Krk's post here. I've started a secret Facebook group for people with ratings below 2000 so that beginners can collaborate with each other on various aspects of competitive programming. It would be really appreciated if some  red or  orange guys help us by joining the process. Please do comment with your ideas and participate. Upvote if you're interested in joining the group so that it'll give a rough idea on statistics.

Group Guidelines

  • Don't post spam.
  • Do some "Googling" before asking basic questions.
  • Comment here if you want to improve with some ideas.

How to join?

If you would like to join this described group — please message me with your e-mail address. (Please do remember to send the email through which you've registered on facebook. Not the link to the fb-profile. Also, check your email after that. I can guarantee that you'll get an e-mail within 6hrs)

UPDATE :- GROUP HAS BEEN CREATED.

UPDATE 2 :- Many people have joined till now. Discussions have begun. Everyone is cordially invited.
